name: The Search For Utopia
description:
Game made for the #38 Godot Wild Jam. The theme is "Solarpunk" and the "Behold" wild card was used.

PLEASE PLAY WITH SOUND ON

Controls

  • Left Mouse Click: Take photo
  • Right Mouse Click: Enter / Exit photo mode
  • Mouse Movement: Pan the camera in photo mode
  • Mouse Wheel: Zoom in / out in photo mode
